pages.text: $(li)The Glowstone is a light source block that can be used to illuminate dark places.$(br)$(li)This block can be used to craft a $(l:patchouli:redstone/vanilla/redstone_lamp)Redstone Lamp$(/l), or $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/respawn_anchor)Respawn Anchor$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l).
